programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Hëna
programme.desc: Ndërkohë që kontratës së tij 3 vjeçare si minator në Hënë po i vjen fundi, njeriu i vetëm (Sam Rockwell) që ndodhet aty, bën një zbulim që vendos në dilemë gjithçka që ai ka njohur deri më tani...
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Rendi i ri botëror
programme.desc: Ndërsa grupi më i madh kriminal Korean zgjeron pushtetin, agjenti Ja-Seoung dërgohet të infiltrohet në grupin e tyre. Pas disa kohësh me ta, atij i duhet të zgjedhjë të ndjekë urdhërat e policisë, apo t'i qëndrojë besnik bandës.
programme.category: Krim
dramë

programme.title: Fëmijët
programme.desc: Pushimet e shumëpritura kthehen në një makth të vërtetë për mbijetesë, kur fëmijët fillojnë të masakrojnë prindërit e tyre në mënyra të tmerrshme.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Të mallkuarit
programme.desc: Regjia: Wes Craven; Aktorët: Christina Ricci, Joshua Jackson. Një grup të rinjsh e gjejnë veten të mbërthyer në një tmerr të paimagjinueshëm-dy nga vajzat kafshohen nga një kafshë misterioze dhe në ditët në vijim ndryshojnë sjellje.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Gjahtarët e demonëve: Qyteti i eshtrave
programme.desc: Lily Collins. Pas zhdukjes së të ëmës, një adoleshente njujorkeze zbulon se është pasardhëse e një linje luftëtarësh që mbrojnë botën nga demonët. Kur bashkon forcat me ta, ajo njeh një botë paralele mbushur me krijesa të rrezikshme...
programme.category: Fantazi
Aksion
Horror

programme.title: Pushteti i pestë
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch, Daniel Brühl. Kjo është historia e vërtetë sesi krijuesit e WikiLeaks, Julian Assange dhe Daniel Berg rrezikuan jetët e tyre dhe të shumë njerëzve të tjerë, për të nxjerrë në shesh të vërtetën...
programme.category: Biografi

programme.title: Super 8
programme.desc: Një bashkëpunim i J.J. Abrams me Steven Spielberg. Në verën e vitit 1979, një grup miqsh bëhen dëshmitarë të një aksidenti me tren. Shumë shpejt ata kuptojnë që çfarëdo që ka shpëtuar, është shumë më e tmerrshme se ç'mund të imagjinohet.
programme.category: Mister
fantashkencë

programme.title: Pajisja Fantazmë
programme.desc: Me E.Harris, D.Duchovny. Në kulmin e Luftës së Ftohtë, një nëndetëse ruse e armatosur me raketa nukelare, zhduket ne oqeanin Paqësor. Në bordin e saj, një kapiten veteran dhe një agjent i KGB-së, ndodhen në një betejë për jetë a vdekje...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Libri i shenjtë
programme.desc: Denzel Washington, Gary Oldman. Një hero në një botë post-apokaliptike, në një udhëtim epik përmes Amerikës në mbrojtje të një libri të shenjtë ku shkruhen sekretet për shpëtimin e të gjithë racës njerëzore...
programme.category: Aventurë

programme.title: Korridori i errët
programme.desc: 2018. Anna Sophia Robb, Uma Thurman. Një adoleshente problematike dërgohet në një shkollë ekskluzive me konvikt, ku aftësitë e jashtëzakontëshme të studentëve vijnë më në kosto të mbinatyrshme...
programme.category: Horror
fantazi

programme.title: Heshtja para stuhisë
programme.desc: 2019. Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Diane Lane. Kapiteni i një anije peshkimi përballet me një dileme morale, kur ish-bashkëshortja rishfaqet dhe i përgjërohet që të vrasë bashkëshortin e saj abuziv.
programme.category: Thriller
drame

programme.title: Në periferi
programme.desc: Një djalë i ri detyrohet të kujdeset për motrat e tij të vogla pasi e ëma burgoset për vrasjen e babait të tyre abuzues. Por kur ai nis një lidhje me një grua të martuar, sekrete familjare të fshehura prej kohësh, fillojnë të dalin në sipërfaqe...
programme.category: Thriller
dramë

programme.title: I paracaktuari
programme.desc: 2014. Ethan Hawke. Një agjent special, ka si detyrë që të udhëtojë në kohë dhe të parandalojë krimet... Tani, në misionin e tij të fundit, ai duhet të kapë një kriminel që i ka shpëtuar gjithë jetën dhe që po planifikon një akt terrorist...
programme.category: Fantashkencë
mister

programme.title: Një martesë e lumtur
programme.desc: Joan Allen, Anthony LaPaglia. Bazuar në historinë me të njëjtin titull nga Stephen King. Ndërkohë që bashkëshorti i saj për më shumë se 20 vite ndodhet në një udhëtim jashtë qytetit, një grua zbulon sekretin e tij të tmerrshëm.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Ditë të vështira
programme.desc: Ralph Fiennes, Juliette Lewis. Natën e ndërrimit të shekujve, forma më e re e argëtimit janë bërë disa pjese filmike përmes të cilave mund të perjetohen përvojat ekstreme të të tjereve. Një ish polic perfshihet në zbulimin e nje vrasjeje.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Lidhja e erret e motrave
programme.desc: Një adoleshente rrëfen se është viktimë e një grupimi sekret vajzash gjimnaziste, i quajtur "Motra e Natës". Nga ky moment, një qytet i qetë periferik bëhet sfondi i një gjyqi modern të shtrigave të Salemit.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Banda e Stenderit
programme.desc: Thomas Jane, David O'Hara, Dexter Fletcher. Historia e vërtetë e Andre Stander, polic i dekoruar, i cili u kthye në grabitës bankash. Bashkë me dy njerëz që njohu në burg, ai formoi grupin shumë të rrezikshëm 'Banda e Stenderit'.
programme.category: Biografi

programme.title: Stacioni i numrave
programme.desc: John Cusack, Malin Akerman. Një agjent special, merr në mbrojtje një 'lexuese' të kodeve sekrete të CIA-s... Por kur qendra sulmohet, ata duhet të gjejnë një zgjidhje para se të jetë shumë vonë...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Kati i shtatë
programme.desc: Ricardo Darín. Në avokat i suksesshëm në Buenos Aires nis një kërkim të dëshpëruar për të gjetur fëmijet e tij, të cilët zhduken ndërsa zbresin shkallët nga apartamenti i tyre në katin e shtatë.
programme.category: Thriller
mister

programme.title: Përbindëshat
programme.desc: 2010. Gjashtë vjet pasi alienë gjigantë shfaqen në një zonë të izoluar në Meksikë, një çift detyrohet të udhëtojë mespërmes territorit të rrezikshëm për t'u kthyer në shtëpi. Ajo që do të zbulojnë atje sfidon çdo shpjegim të arsyeshëm.
programme.category: Horror
fantashkencë

programme.title: Djalli në Kuti
programme.desc: Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Kyra Sedgwick. Frymëzuar nga një histori e vërtetë. Dy prindër të divorcuar do të bëjnë të pamundurën për të shpëtuar vajzën e tyre nga një forcë djallëzore e tmerrshme.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Shpina e djallit
programme.desc: Regjia: Guillermo Del Toro. Gjatë luftës civile spanjolle, një djalosh jetim, përndiqet dhe torturohet nga pastruesi i jetimores dhe fantazma e një fëmije të vrarë pak para se ai të mbërrinte.
programme.category: Horror
mister

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
Ljetno kino 300: Uspon carstva
programme.desc:
300: Rise of an Empire: Directed by Noam Murro. With Sullivan Stapleton, Eva Green, Lena Headey, Hans Matheson. Greek general Themistokles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1253863/","name":"300: Rise of an Empire","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEwNTU2MjAwMDdeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDk2Njc2Njk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Greek general Themistokles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1253863/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tedg"},"dateCreated":"2014-03-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slaves in the Hold","reviewBody":"I live near Pat Robertson's elaborate film school, and have often wondered what the world will be like when religious extremists master effective filmmaking. What happens when we move from Roger Ailes to Leni Riefenstahl? Well, here we have something that tells me we are close.

The values behind this thing are disturbing, even repellent. The history is even backwards, needlessly so. But this is so finely crafted, so extraordinarily fine tuned story-telling that I have to remark on it. So set aside the dangerous notions of self and sex as explosive violence. Set aside jingowoven, hooha misogyny. Set aside the notion that every blow is spectacularly fatal. 

The original was notable in its production method; a few real objects and bodies in the foreground with synthesized, situational background. A side effect of this method allowed two teams to optimize independently. So the main characters had refined, economical costumes and totems.

The similar, more traditional process used for example in "Gravity" tightly connected the synthesized bits with the foreground actors, with the side effect of constraining both. Narrative economy had to be found elsewhere, and was.

But here, you basically have two movies, one playing behind the other. Each has its own cinematic philosophy and creative team.

An example of how conscious of this and clever these folks are; how do you integrate these? I mean visually, because this is essentially a new cinematic vocabulary. Well, you introduce spatial dust that exists in both worlds simultaneously. Every scene here has this dust, sometimes floating embers. It jars at first, but the distraction is necessary to its effectiveness. 

Another example: nearly every filmed battle we have in our cinematic tradition is a land battle. We have a couple of those here. But they are nested in a grander sea battle, just as the former movie is nested in the story. How do you stage and choreograph such a thing?

And here, I was also impressed by the talent and novelty brought to the problem. For the first time, we have battles with new motions and cameras. Oh, we still have the big lugs in the foreground doing their traditional Kurosawa through Braveheart thing. But how to be exciting with ships? How to convey situation?

A notable technique messed with my brain. They messed with the physics of water. The cinematic Ted loved how the stage was bent. Ships here literally come over impossible huge standing hills of water. Notions of speed and penetration were borrowed from other worlds. (Is this common in video games?) The scientific Ted had to simply live with it. 

Integrating foreground and background? Water and oars were rendered using the same tropes as sword and blood.

A lot of art here. No decision seems to have been the default one. A bushel of economies are delivered, including the economy of theatrical urges. Urges made plain, visible and fluid.

I only wish they were on my team, working to challenge and enrich. What happens when practically evil minds get these methods?

Ted's Evaluation -- 2 of 3: Has some interesting elements."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":290880,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-03-05","keywords":"violent sex,greek,army,navy,antiquity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2982128409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3Nzk5NTM4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTg4OTAwMTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3Nzk5NTM4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTg4OTAwMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Greek general Themistokles attempts to unite all of Greece by leading the charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia vengeful commander of the Persian navy."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822982/","name":"Sullivan Stapleton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1200692/","name":"Eva Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372176/","name":"Lena Headey"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1729171/","name":"Noam Murro"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0199432/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811583/","name":"Zack Snyder"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0426500/","name":"Kurt Johnstad"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588340/","name":"Frank Miller"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hollywood: Na snimanju
programme.desc: Hollywood: Na snimanju" donosi ekskluzivni materijal sa setova najnovijih filmova. Hollywood: Na snimanju" donosi ekskluzivni materijal sa setova najnovijih filmova. Svaka epizoda predstavlja tri nova buduća kinohita čije se premijere tek očekuju i donosi informacije o tome tko ih je i kako snimio!

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: U WONDER WOMAN 1984, sudbina svijeta još jedanput je na kocki, a samo ga Wonder Woman može spasiti. Nova priča zatječe Dianu Prince kako neprimjetno živi među smrtnicima u živahnim, elegantnim... U WONDER WOMAN 1984, sudbina svijeta još jedanput je na kocki, a samo ga Wonder Woman može spasiti. Nova priča zatječe Dianu Prince kako neprimjetno živi među smrtnicima u živahnim, elegantnim 1980-ima - eri hedonizma i želje za posjedovanjem. Iako je u potpunosti razvila svoje moći, ona ostaje pritajena, bavi se prikupljanjem drevnih artefakta, a herojska djela izvodi samo potajno. Međutim, Diana će uskoro morati skupiti svu svoju snagu, mudrost i hrabrost kad se sukobi s Maxwellom Lordom i Cheetom, zlikovkom koja posjeduje nadljudsku snagu i spretnost.

credits.actor: Steve Basilone, Jennifer Irwin, Jess Jacobs, Finn Wittrock, Wendi McLendon-Covey, Damon Wayans Jr., Ellison Randell, Carter Morgan

programme.title: Cars
Auti
programme.desc: Cars: Directed by John Lasseter, Joe Ranft. With Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt, Larry the Cable Guy. A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ahuffman_2000"},"dateCreated":"2006-05-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar and Disney did it again!","reviewBody":"Without giving away any of the story, here's my take. I attended the premiere of CARS at LMS on Friday, May 26. True to Disney form, the premiere itself was spectacular. Four giant screens, live entertainment,lots of fireworks, great inclusion of military personnel, and as good of a red carpet as you can do with chain link fenced areas... This movie rates right in the middle of Pixar releases for me. I place it above Monsters Inc, A Bug's Life and Toy Story 2, but not as good as the "original", the best ever, Toy Story, and The Incredibles. Everything just looks so real in this movie. The dust stirred up when Lightning drives off, the scenery around Route 66 (well, maybe not those mountains that look like the fins of old cars). Even the shine on the clean cars looks so real. As an adult, I enjoyed the story line. I can't tell you how the kids would like it, as by the time the movie finally started, my kids were asleep. As always, don't leave your seat until all of the credits roll. Sometimes they are some of the funniest clips in the movie! You'll love them this time, as they tie back to prior Pixar movies, in a car sort of way. This is definitely a movie we'll add to the DVD collection. I really hope this movie does well since it's the first release since Disney bought Pixar. Don't go in looking for the action or adult humor of The Incredibles. If you do you'll be disappointed. Just go in looking for the "Disney always has a good moral behind its animated movies" type of movie and you will really enjoy it. Paul Newman and Larry the Cable Guy really have the best characters in the movie. And while John Ratzenberger's character doesn't have a lot of screen time, I really enjoyed him! I'll be going back to see it when it releases in theaters so I can get a better feel for the sound, as it wasn't the best in an outdoor setting. programme.review: --- Actors: Owen Wilson (role=Lightning McQueen), Paul Newman (role=Doc Hudson), Bonnie Hunt (role=Sally Carrera), Larry the Cable Guy (role=Mater), Cheech Marin (role=Ramone), Tony Shalhoub (role=Luigi), Guido Quaroni (role=Guido), Jenifer Lewis (role=Flo), Paul Dooley (role=Sarge), Michael Wallis (role=Sheriff), George Carlin (role=Fillmore), Katherine Helmond (role=Lizzie)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0317219, Title: Cars, --- Description: Cars: Directed by John Lasseter, Joe Ranft. With Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt, Larry the Cable Guy. A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ahuffman_2000","dateCreated":"2006-05-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar and Disney did it again!","reviewBody":"Without giving away any of the story, here's my take. I attended the premiere of CARS at LMS on Friday, May 26. True to Disney form, the premiere itself was spectacular. Four giant screens, live entertainment,lots of fireworks, great inclusion of military personnel, and as good of a red carpet as you can do with chain link fenced areas... This movie rates right in the middle of Pixar releases for me. I place it above Monsters Inc, A Bug's Life and Toy Story 2, but not as good as the "original", the best ever, Toy Story, and The Incredibles. Everything just looks so real in this movie. The dust stirred up when Lightning drives off, the scenery around Route 66 (well, maybe not those mountains that look like the fins of old cars). Even the shine on the clean cars looks so real. As an adult, I enjoyed the story line. I can't tell you how the kids would like it, as by the time the movie finally started, my kids were asleep. As always, don't leave your seat until all of the credits roll. Sometimes they are some of the funniest clips in the movie! You'll love them this time, as they tie back to prior Pixar movies, in a car sort of way. This is definitely a movie we'll add to the DVD collection. I really hope this movie does well since it's the first release since Disney bought Pixar. Don't go in looking for the action or adult humor of The Incredibles. If you do you'll be disappointed. Just go in looking for the "Disney always has a good moral behind its animated movies" type of movie and you will really enjoy it. Paul Newman and Larry the Cable Guy really have the best characters in the movie. And while John Ratzenberger's character doesn't have a lot of screen time, I really enjoyed him! I'll be going back to see it when it releases in theaters so I can get a better feel for the sound, as it wasn't the best in an outdoor setting. In my opinion, it easily beats the other animated movies released over the past year or so.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":393517,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"],"duration":"PT1H57M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Stargirl
programme.desc: DC-jeva "Stargirl" prati srednjoškolku Courtney Whitmore dok nadahnjuje neočekivanu skupinu mladih junaka da zaustave zlikovce iz prošlosti. DC-jeva "Stargirl" prati srednjoškolku Courtney Whitmore dok nadahnjuje neočekivanu skupinu mladih junaka da zaustave zlikovce iz prošlosti. Ova nova drama daje novi pogled na Stargirl i prvi tim superheroja, Američko društvo pravde, u ovoj nepredvidivoj seriji koja se fokusira na lik koji je pokrenuo karijeru kreatora Geoffa Johnsa kao pisca stripova kad ju je osmislio 1999., s ljubavlju nadahnut svojom pokojnom sestrom koja je poginula u avionskoj nesreći.

programme.title: Casino Royale
Casino Royale
programme.desc:
Casino Royale: Directed by Martin Campbell. With Daniel Craig, Eva Green, Mads Mikkelsen, Judi Dench. After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0381061/","name":"Casino Royale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI5ZWJhOWItYTlhOC00YWNhLTlkNzctNDU5YTI1M2E1MWZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"After earning 00 status and a licence to kill, secret agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007. Bond must defeat a private banker funding terrorists in a high-stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0381061/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nikhilvarma89"},"dateCreated":"2006-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Daniel Craig you are here to stay!","reviewBody":"This is among the best bond movies! You have to see it. 

After all the controversy and comments on Daniel Craig's potential as an actor and doubts over him playing Bond...i'd say forget it and be enthralled by the new BOND! He's here to stay.

He has that natural feeling about him when you see him on the screen as Bond, that attitude, style, confidence matched only by Sean COnnery. The movie as a whole is extremely entertaining and exciting.The acting is awesome Eva Green actually does a great job and has really improved her acting from the last time i saw her (in kingdom of heaven), but then this is a totally different movie.

There's a lot of action mixed with great story which i am sure will please the true Bond fan.

Please go and watch this because you will regret if you don't, forget the past this is the New Bond.

9/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":631938,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2006-11-15","keywords":"poker,james bond character,poker game,espionage,based on novel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Casino Royale","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1859520025","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzAxYzc2YTItMjhjZi00Y2E5LWFhYWMtNzY4ODFlZmQ2MzJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzAxYzc2YTItMjhjZi00Y2E5LWFhYWMtNzY4ODFlZmQ2MzJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Casino Royale"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0185819/","name":"Daniel Craig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1200692/","name":"Eva Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001132/","name":"Judi Dench"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0132709/","name":"Martin Campbell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054040/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0200563/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701031/","name":"Neal Purvis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905498/","name":"Robert Wade"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0353673/","name":"Paul Haggis"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nesigurna
programme.desc: Od kreatorice / scenaristice / zvijezde Isse Rae, serija "Nesigurna" bavi se nerazdvojnom grupom prijateljica, milenijalki i crnkinja koje navigiraju neugodnim i formativnim iskustvima u srcu L. A.-a. Od kreatorice / scenaristice / zvijezde Isse Rae, serija "Nesigurna" bavi se nerazdvojnom grupom prijateljica, milenijalki i crnkinja koje navigiraju neugodnim i formativnim iskustvima u srcu L. A.-a. Iako je sputava Molly, dugogodišnja najbolja prijateljica i korporativna odvjetnica koja se sjajno snalazi pred raznim odborima, ali ne i s osjećajima, Issa je strastvena graditeljica zajednice iz Inglewooda čija neodlučnost često omete njezinu viziju. Radnja se nastavlja nedugo nakon što su obje prijateljice dobile nogu od svojih partnera. Peta i posljednja sezona prati naše glavne junakinje, uz smiješnu Kelli i zahtjevnu Tiffany, kako pokušavaju stati na noge i nastaviti sa životom.

programme.title: Bez oduševljenja, molim!
programme.desc: Larry David ima sve - zašto onda uvijek uporno u svemu zabrlja? Larry David glumi... Larry David ima sve - zašto onda uvijek uporno u svemu zabrlja? Larry David glumi... Larryja Davida u ovoj hvaljenoj humorističnoj seriji u verité stilu koja ga prati kod kuće, na poslu i po gradu dok se suočava s raznim problemima s izmišljenim i stvarnim ličnostima. U sporednim ulogama glume Jeff Garlin i Cheryl Hines.

programme.title: Deadpool
Deadpool
programme.desc:
Deadpool: Directed by Tim Miller. With Ryan Reynolds, Karan Soni, Ed Skrein, Michael Benyaer. A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1431045/","name":"Deadpool","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzE5MjY1ZDgtMTkyNC00MTMyLThhMjAtZGI5OTE1NzFlZGJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1431045/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"adamsmith-51004"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-16","inLanguage":"English","name":""Please don't make the super suit green...or animated!"","reviewBody":"One of the greatest anti-hero - the Merc with a mouth - Wade Wilson was once a special forces operative but turned mercenary. After being subjected to a rogue experiment, he finds himself with accelerated healing and transforms himself into Deadpool. Armed with weapons (and a wicked sense of humour) he will stop at nothing to track down the men responsible.

Never have I seen so many fans (or moviegoers), dying to see a character like Deadpool on the big screen; it's a bit like how everyone wanted to see The Avengers on the big screen back in late 2011. It's bad enough that the studios can't seem to get the character right with the disaster that was X-Men Origins: Wolverine. But the respect and love that fans have for this character stayed strong until everyone's prays was finally answered by this movie. And it did not disappoint, because Deadpool lives up to hype by being entertaining and hilarious. While I don't think it is a masterpiece of all comic book movies I did have fun watching this movie. It's a film that fans wanted and got.

I can't imagine anyone else in Hollywood playing Deadpool but only Ryan Reynolds. He was born to play this character and he's the only actor that I think of to do the character justice. Reynolds as expected did that, and has made the character of Deadpool his own. He was terrific as the mouth talking, ant-hero bad-ass. This is Ryan Reynolds come back role after his past disasters roles that mostly involves Green Lantern and Origins Wolverine (that this movie brilliantly makes fun off). Reynolds was just perfect for this character and he did a great performance in this film. He delivered the comedic timing and the somewhat of a hidden charm that Deadpool has. Ryan Reynolds absolutely nailed it.

The writing in this movie was surprisingly good, which I didn't expect for a movie with this kind of character. Of course there are Easter eggs, references and nods to the comics and Marvel movies, but in this movie it's done in such a way that feels kind of refreshing. I know for a fact that I missed a lot of the jokes and references due to amount of laughter that I had while watching the movie. I can say it with a brave face that the writing is this movies biggest strength, because it's self awareness on Marvel movies and itself was all top notch.

I'm so happy that this movie is rated 18 and not some watered down movie, because if you honestly think a Deadpool movie should be rated anything less then you really don't know the character at all.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":966247,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2016-02-17","keywords":"breaking the fourth wall,anti hero,sex scene,mercenary,revenge","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Even-More-Voiced-Over Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi567457049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0Nzk0NzAzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk1Njg5NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0Nzk0NzAzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk1Njg5NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A groundbreaking 4th wall breaking trailer breakdown of a character who breaks the 4th wall, including extra voice-over on a trailer that includes a voice-over. 8 walls + 4 breaks + 2 voice overs = 1 game-changing superhero."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1072555/","name":"Morena Baccarin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2554352/","name":"T.J. Miller"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1783265/","name":"Tim Miller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014201/","name":"Rhett Reese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1116660/","name":"Paul Wernick"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

Reynolds as expected did that, and has made the character of Deadpool his own. He was terrific as the mouth talking, ant-hero bad-ass. This is Ryan Reynolds come back role after his past disasters roles that mostly involves Green Lantern and Origins Wolverine (that this movie brilliantly makes fun off). Reynolds was just perfect for this character and he did a great performance in this film. He delivered the comedic timing and the somewhat of a hidden charm that Deadpool has. Ryan Reynolds absolutely nailed it.

The writing in this movie was surprisingly good, which I didn't expect for a movie with this kind of character. Of course there are Easter eggs, references and nods to the comics and Marvel movies, but in this movie it's done in such a way that feels kind of refreshing. I know for a fact that I missed a lot of the jokes and references due to amount of laughter that I had while watching the movie. I can say it with a brave face that the writing is this movies biggest strength, because it's self awareness on Marvel movies and itself was all top notch.

I'm so happy that this movie is rated 18 and not some watered down movie, because if you honestly think a Deadpool movie should be rated anything less then you really don't know the character at all.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":966247,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2016-02-17","keywords":"breaking the fourth wall,anti hero,sex scene,mercenary,revenge","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Even-More-Voiced-Over Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi567457049","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0Nzk0NzAzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk1Njg5NzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0Nzk0NzAzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk1Njg5NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A groundbreaking 4th wall breaking trailer breakdown of a character who breaks the 4th wall, including extra voice-over on a trailer that includes a voice-over. 8 walls + 4 breaks + 2 voice overs = 1 game-changing superhero.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1072555/","name":"Morena Baccarin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2554352/","name":"T.J. programme.title: Inside Man
Insajder
programme.desc: Inside Man: Directed by Spike Lee. With Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer. A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0454848/","name":"Inside Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjc4MjA2ZDgtOGY3YS00NDYzLTlmNTEtYWMxMzcwZjgzYWNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0454848/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Hitchcoc"},"dateCreated":"2010-03-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just a Tad Smug!","reviewBody":"This is a decent but not particularly memorable movie. I thought that Denzel Washington was pretty good, but he seems to have settled into a type. Confident and unyielding and always right (Coach Boone from Remember the Titans). This is fine and I enjoy watching him. This movie is about a bank robbery where the perpetrators are after more than money. It has to do with a righteous cause, but what happens is that the possibility of pulling it off and getting what they want is on such fragile ground that you need to ask the question, "Isn't there an easier way?" Anyway, the scenes in the bank are quite good but we really need to extend our disbelief at times. I've always wondered about that "get me a plane and a million dollars" business anyway. Well, there's a lot more to it than that. See this and enjoy the characters, but in the long run, it's pretty far fetched.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":357931,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2006-06-28","keywords":"bank,bank robber,hostage,robber,negotiation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Inside Man","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi495889689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMwYjE0MDItYjA4Zi00NTMyLWI5NWItZDA2ZjQ5MWRhMzRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMwYjE0MDItYjA4Zi00NTMyLWI5NWItZDA2ZjQ5MWRhMzRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Inside Man"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654110/","name":"Clive Owen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000149/","name":"Jodie Foster"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000490/","name":"Spike Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1897957/","name":"Russell Gewirtz"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Unstoppable
Nezaustavljiv
programme.desc:
Unstoppable: Directed by Tony Scott. With Denzel Washington, Chris Pine, Rosario Dawson, Ethan Suplee. With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0477080/","name":"Unstoppable","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI4NDQwMDM0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzY1ODMwNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0477080/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"colin_coyne"},"dateCreated":"2010-11-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"All aboard for a thrill ride !!","reviewBody":"Loosely based on a true story from 2001, UNSTOPPABLE is a tension packed, heart-racing juggernaut of a movie about an unmanned, runaway train carrying a payload of highly flammable fuel and toxic waste that is heading straight for the densely populated of Stanton, Pennsylvania at 70mph.

Several human errors by an incompetent train driver Dewey (Ethan Suplee – "Randy" from My Name is Earl) and his colleagues allows the out of control train to leave the depot without air brakes and security cut out systems and from then on, the race is on to try and stop this out of control half-mile long train "bomb" from devastating a city.

After several attempt fail train driver Frank (played by double Oscar winning Denzel Washington - Training Day, Man on Fire, Malcolm X, Cry Freedom), and rookie conductor Will (Chris Pine - Star Trek) find themselves isolated as the last resort to try and prevent a disaster of epic proportions 

Ably directed by Tony Scott (who has something of a history with trains and Denzel Washington – Taking of Pelham 123, Man on Fire), UNSTOPPABLE features some really good camera work, low ground shots, blur in movement, close-up action and a very imaginative use of sound and music (this film can be really loud in parts) – are things that really emphasizes the feeling of locomotive power, speed and imminent destruction I could swear that my seat was shaking as the train speed increased 

Throw in some human drama, agitated animals and a train load of school kids in peril not to mention the annihilation of a whole city and you have all the ingredients required for an edge of the seat action thriller 

There are very good acting performances also by the supporting cast, namely Rosario Dawson as Connie Hooper the senior train dispatcher who does an admirable job in keeping the tension up and she is the "glue" that holds all the dialogue, characters and plot lines together Kevin Dunn as Oscar Galvin as Hooper's boss and Kevin Corrigan as Inspector Werner – a train safety inspector.

UNSTOPPABLE is very recommended and is a film that really needs to be watched on the big screen in a cinema that has really good surround sound to get the full benefit of the camera work and soundtrack.

UNSTOPPABLE is 98 mins long, is an 12A certificate and will be on general release from Weds 24th November 2010","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":192540,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-11-10","keywords":"train,runaway train,train engineer,freight train,train movie","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Unstoppable: Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3068790297","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNDI1OTk1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg1NDYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNDI1OTk1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg1NDYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rail company frantically works to prevent an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train carrying combustible liquids and poisonous gas from wiping out a city."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1517976/","name":"Chris Pine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0206257/","name":"Rosario Dawson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001716/","name":"Tony Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0276484/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0093560/","name":"Mark Bomback"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

SpaceBoy
programme.desc: SpaceBoy: Directed by Olivier Pairoux. With Basile Grunberger, Albane Masson, Yannick Renier, Bérénice Baôo. A gifted 11-year-old boy secretly builds an air balloon with his friend Emma to prove his father everything in life is possible" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10689606/","name":"SpaceBoy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjkwMDhmZTYtNzQ1YS00Y2I4LWIxNGItZGI5NmIzNWIwMWJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDg3MTYyNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A gifted 11-year-old boy secretly builds an air balloon with his friend Emma to prove his father everything in life is possible","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10689606/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vlad_ivanescu2"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"What an ending!","reviewBody":"I saw this movie at TIFF. Although it was advertised as a children movie, I thought the ending is too sad and touching for the little ones. This is a story about loosing someone close, about how you cope with grief. It can be fun for kids but grownups will see so much more. Congrats to the director.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":72,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"genre":["Adventure","Family"],"datePublished":"2021-03-31","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9708141/","name":"Basile Grunberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9231928/","name":"Albane Masson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1099640/","name":"Yannick Renier"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9601494/","name":"Olivier Pairoux"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0580166/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0449931/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9601495/","name":"Eusebio Larrea"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9601494/","name":"Olivier Pairoux"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Cars 2
Auti 2
programme.desc:
Cars 2: Directed by John Lasseter, Bradford Lewis. With Larry the Cable Guy, Owen Wilson, Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer. Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1216475/","name":"Cars 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNTc3MTU3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzIxNTc3NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espi","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1216475/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thomsedavi"},"dateCreated":"2011-06-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Flawed but still enjoyable","reviewBody":"The best of Pixar's films have protagonists who are a small part of a very large world and are almost helpless against incredible odds - Toy Story, Wall-E, Finding Nemo etc. The protagonists of Cars are very big in a very small world, so do not play to the strengths of Pixar.

However, being Pixar, they still make these films better than anyone else would have with the same material. Cars and Cars 2 are intelligently written and filled with more detail than you could comfortably fit into a single screening.

This movie is not so much a sequel to the first as an affectionate James Bond parody that happens to be set in the Cars universe. Whereas the original Cars was thematically slow and patient, this one deliberately takes things in the exact opposite direction. Whether anyone will prefer the first film or the second is entirely their preference, and it is wrong to say that one is better than the other. Each film has its own appeals and drawbacks.

The main weakness of this film is a failure to create any kind of sympathy for the characters. They are not alone, they are not lost, they have friends and allies and the resources to get out of any situation. It never feels like there is any real danger, as there is with the Toy Story films. Whereas the first film had enough focus on character development to compensate for this, the subplot about the tested friendship between McQueen and Mater seems especially insubstantial here.

Nevertheless, I feel like this is an enjoyable installment in the franchise, never letting your attention wander and always ready with a clever idea. They have demonstrated that they are willing to go in entirely new directions with this world - maybe if they make a third film, they can make something truly worthy of the Pixar name?

If I were rating this in comparison to other Pixar films, my score would be lower... but scoring this as a film on its own, I think it is deserving of between five and seven stars.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":175124,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-06-24","keywords":"car race,car,best friend,spy,conspiracy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Â“Tokyo PartyÂ”","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1822465049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A clip from Cars 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1249256/","name":"Larry the Cable Guy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000323/","name":"Michael Caine"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pregled proteklog tjedna s Johnom Oliverom
programme.desc: Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće. Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće događaje. Svaka epizoda daje Oliveru jedinstvenu platformu odakle može nuditi svoje specifično gledište o svjetskim problemima uz razne posebne goste i segmente.

programme.title: Quantum of Solace
Zrno utjehe
programme.desc:
Quantum of Solace: Directed by Marc Forster. With Daniel Craig, Olga Kurylenko, Mathieu Amalric, Judi Dench. James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0830515/","name":"Quantum of Solace","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZiYTUzMzktZWI5Yy00Mzk4LWFlMDgtYjRmNWU0Mzc0MzNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUzOTY1NTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0830515/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"murtaza_mma"},"dateCreated":"2008-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Potpourri of Vestiges: The Quantum that lacked Solace","reviewBody":"Quantum of Solace or Quantum so less, as some of its critics may call it, definitely lacks certain aspects of a traditional Bond movie. It may be eccentric in the sense that it may not be able to titillate the esoteric Bond fans as it may lack their eclectic style and taste but it definitely succeeds in projecting a new Bond for the contemporary world who may not be a coeval of a superhero, who despite being vulnerable has got the killer instinct in him, which is the very defining characteristic of Ian Fleming's larger than life human incarnate. This Bond goes about his business in a fashion which is far more realistic compared to the Bond of the bygone era with an incredible passion and utmost devotion which is nothing but inexorable. Though Casino Royale was the pioneer of this graduation but its Quantum of Solace that consummates it and gives Fleming's agent a mystique which has always eluded him hitherto, an aura which gives him an opportunity to be mortal and hence a chance to qualify to be called a human.

Quantum of Solace is loaded with mind blowing action sequences which makes it a high octane extravaganza. The pace of the movie is such that you hardly get time to breathe freely. The plot though comparatively weaker than its precursor, is still good enough to keep one guessing thereby keeping one at the edge of the seat, all the way through. 

The only aspect of the movie which should be under the scanner is its editing which is far from just and at times needless and severely annoying. A bit constraint editing under some meticulous vigilance could have done wonders and would have probably helped it, in its quest to be the best Bond movie of all time. 

All being said and given what we have, the movie fails to disappoint the audience and will surely redefine the very prerequisites of an action movie and will definitely serve as a benchmark for the movies in the years to come.

http://www.apotpourriofvestiges.com/","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":433920,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2008-11-05","keywords":"james bond character,water rights,spy hero,secret agent,british intelligence","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Quantum of Solace: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1024524313","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzkxNzc5NTc0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTYxNjYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzkxNzc5NTc0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTYxNjYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the second theatrical trailer for Quantum of Solace, directed by Marc Forster."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0185819/","name":"Daniel Craig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1385871/","name":"Olga Kurylenko"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0023832/","name":"Mathieu Amalric"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0286975/","name":"Marc Forster"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054040/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0353673/","name":"Paul Haggis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701031/","name":"Neal Purvis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905498/","name":"Robert Wade"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter I Odaja Tajni
programme.desc:
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets: Directed by Chris Columbus. With Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson, Richard Griffiths. An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0295297/","name":"Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcxODgwMDkxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMDk2MDg3._V1_.jpg","description":"An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0295297/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MaxBorg89"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Back to school, Mr. Potter: a superior second installment","reviewBody":"Having done a good job with the first Harry Potter flick, one shouldn't be surprised Chris Columbus was asked to direct the sequel as well. And the second film actually improves on its predecessor, getting a little edgier and less children-friendly (two factors that raise exponentially with each new installment), even though it does repeat an old mistake in certain places.

So, what about the plot? Well, it's Harry's (Daniel Radcliffe) second year at Hogwarts, and everything should be fine, given he defeated Voldemort in the previous film and there are no other threats lurking in the magical world. Or are there? A mysterious house elf named Dobby seems to think so, as he repeatedly tries to prevent Harry from returning to school and keeps asking him to leave when students start being attacked by a supernatural, unknown foe. All this seems to be connected to the Chamber of Secrets, but that isn't of much help, especially considering the new Defense against the Dark Arts teacher, famous writer Gilderoy Lockhart (Kenneth Branagh), is a complete idiot.

Darker and faster, Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets repeats the Philosopher's Stone's mistake of being slightly too faithful to the literary source, but Columbus manages to compensate this flaw with better visuals, some really creepy set-ups and improved acting from the younger cast members (Emma Watson in particular). He has also made interesting choices when it comes to the new faces in the adult group: Branagh is very, very funny as the ego-fueled Lockhart (a role originally intended for Hugh Grant), but the most interesting addition is Jason Isaacs (whom I can't wait to see again in the fourth film) as Lucius Malfoy, an intriguingly sinister wizard who is as racist and arrogant as his son, Harry's arch-nemesis Draco. As for Dobby, a CG creature voiced by Toby Jones, he is interesting at first but rapidly becomes annoying, his masochistic antics being repetitive and a little dull.

Finally, a special mention for Chamber's best element: Richard Harris, who sadly passed away a few weeks before the movie's premiere. He was, and is, incredibly good as headmaster Dumbledore and despite a worthy replacement (Michael Gambon), in the purists' hearts he will always be the one and only greatest wizard of all time.

Verdict: good, but they could have done better. Thankfully, they did with number three...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":592477,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2003-01-15","keywords":"invisibility cloak,sequel,wizard,basilisk,killing a monster","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1705771289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmI3ZjNhNjYtODhjOC00NjlkLWE4MTItMDhiOGVmZmIwOWMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmI3ZjNhNjYtODhjOC00NjlkLWE4MTItMDhiOGVmZmIwOWMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0705356/","name":"Daniel Radcliffe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342488/","name":"Rupert Grint"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914612/","name":"Emma Watson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746830/","name":"J.K. Rowling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460141/","name":"Steve Kloves"}],"duration":"PT2H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Rocky
Roki
programme.desc: Rocky: Directed by John G. Avildsen. With Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers. A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0075148/","name":"Rocky","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5MDMzODUyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTQ3NTMyNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0075148/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marcrice"},"dateCreated":"2016-03-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie, great soundtrack a classic","reviewBody":"What can you say about a this movie that has not been said already? It is my all time favorite movie series ever and I could watch every movies back to back time and time again. I have owned this movie series on Video, DVD, Blu-ray and owned just about every version going.\n\nThe main story is about one mans struggles to overcome the odds life has stacked against him but it is also a love story. There are real touches of greatness such as Burgess Meredith as Mickey as veteran boxer who does not want to train Rocky as he sees him as a washed out bum until he is offered a shot at the big time. Then seeing his relationship with Rocky grow. The acting is superb and the music still pumps my blood to this day. This may have been the movie to invent the training montage which is now a must in any movie about sports or fighting. Stallone's performance is phenomenal as the film celebrates the underdog battling to beat the odds and it is still amazing almost 40 years after release.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":547005,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"1976-12-03","keywords":"1970s,fist,rocky balboa character,one word title,low budget film","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rocky","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2997093657","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjdiMDY4MjAtZTMzZi00NjIyLTk4N2MtN2I0ZTNjZTk3MjZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjdiMDY4MjAtZTMzZi00NjIyLTk4N2MtN2I0ZTNjZTk3MjZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from MGM/UA"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001735/","name":"Talia Shire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0949350/","name":"Burt Young"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000814/","name":"John G. programme.title: Rocky II
Rocky 2
programme.desc:
Rocky II: Directed by Sylvester Stallone. With Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers. Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0079817/","name":"Rocky II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGFjMTdmOTktNTJkNi00YWM2LTgzZjYtOWVkMTUyMGNjZDUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwNDgzNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0079817/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Cinemaniac1984"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"A worthy sequel that goes the distance.","reviewBody":"Rocky II continued on from the first movie, and though it was no easy task, Sylvester Stallone did a terrific job returning to his now iconic role as well as taking on both roles as writer and director.

Rocky Balboa (Sylvester Stallone) has retired from boxing on medical grounds and is getting used to his newfound fame. Unfortunately, his post-boxing career has not flourished which sees him going back to dead end jobs such as working at the meat packing company with his best friend and brother in law Paulie (Burt Young) to keep his head above financial dire straits and his newly wedded wife Adrian (Talia Shire) vows to stay loyal to him. Meanwhile, Apollo Creed (Carl Weathers) is enraged by all the hate mail that he is receiving, mostly telling him that his championship match was nothing more than a fluke and vows to do everything in his power to goad Rocky Balboa into a rematch. Though Adrian is upset with Rocky's decision to return to the ring, Rocky teams back up with his trainer Mickey (Burgess Meredith) to regain his passion and pride.

The cast is faultless, and the spirit of the first movie still remains intact. In fact, I found the training scenes to be a lot more uplifting, and I found myself secretly cheering during the penultimate match. And the ending unashamedly had me in tears.

I've always had a soft spot for Rocky II and years later, it's one of the few movies that has me going through a roller-coaster of emotions. In some ways, I wish this was the ending of the first Rocky movie. But it is what it is. Still Rocky II is a worthy sequel that goes the distance.

8/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":201598,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"1979-06-15","keywords":"rocky balboa character,adrian character,paulie character,rocky balboa jr character,mickey goldmill character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rocky II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2087782169","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI5MjQ4YmEtMGVhNC00ZTYxLWEzNTctN2YzNTJiODg1OGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI5MjQ4YmEtMGVhNC00ZTYxLWEzNTctN2YzNTJiODg1OGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Rocky II"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001735/","name":"Talia Shire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0949350/","name":"Burt Young"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054262/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0079817, Title: Rocky II, --- Description: Rocky II: Directed by Sylvester Stallone. With Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers. Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0079817/","name":"Rocky II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGFjMTdmOTktNTJkNi00YWM2LTgzZjYtOWVkMTUyMGNjZDUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwNDgzNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0079817/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Cinemaniac1984","dateCreated":"2017-02-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"A worthy sequel that goes the distance.","reviewBody":"Rocky II continued on from the first movie, and though it was no easy task, Sylvester Stallone did a terrific job returning to his now iconic role as well as taking on both roles as writer and director.

Rocky Balboa (Sylvester Stallone) has retired from boxing on medical grounds and is getting used to his newfound fame. Unfortunately, his post-boxing career has not flourished which sees him going back to dead end jobs such as working at the meat packing company with his best friend and brother in law Paulie (Burt Young) to keep his head above financial dire straits and his newly wedded wife Adrian (Talia Shire) vows to stay loyal to him. Meanwhile, Apollo Creed (Carl Weathers) is enraged by all the hate mail that he is receiving, mostly telling him that his championship match was nothing more than a fluke and vows to do everything in his power to goad Rocky Balboa into a rematch. Though Adrian is upset with Rocky's decision to return to the ring, Rocky teams back up with his trainer Mickey (Burgess Meredith) to regain his passion and pride.

The cast is faultless, and the spirit of the first movie still remains intact. In fact, I found the training scenes to be a lot more uplifting, and I found myself secretly cheering during the penultimate match. And the ending unashamedly had me in tears.

I've always had a soft spot for Rocky II and years later, it's one of the few movies that has me going through a roller-coaster of emotions. In some ways, I wish this was the ending of the first Rocky movie. But it is what it is. Still Rocky II is a worthy sequel that goes the distance.

8/10.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":201598,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"1979-06-15","keywords":"rocky balboa character,adrian character,paulie character,rocky balboa jr character,mickey goldmill character","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rocky II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2087782169","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI5MjQ4YmEtMGVhNC00ZTYxLWEzNTctN2YzNTJiODg1OGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDI5MjQ4YmEtMGVhNC00ZTYxLWEzNTctN2YzNTJiODg1OGY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Rocky II","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001735/","name":"Talia Shire","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0949350/","name":"Burt Young"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054262/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"],"duration":"PT1H59M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Rocky III
Rocky 3
programme.desc: Rocky III: Directed by Sylvester Stallone. With Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers. Rocky faces the ultimate challenge from a powerful new contender, and must turn to a former rival to help regain his throne as the undisputed fighting champion." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0084602/","name":"Rocky III","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyOTYzMDMzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTkzODM1NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Rocky faces the ultimate challenge from a powerful new contender, and must turn to a former rival to help regain his throne as the undisputed fighting champion.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0084602/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Smells_Like_Cheese"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Makes you want to go the distance and hit someone :D","reviewBody":"You know, a few months ago, I felt that it's kinda silly for me to claim to be a movie fan yet not see the Rocky movies and my friend even told me that it's a must see to be an official movie fanatic. So, I had decided to see all the Rocky flicks, and low and behold there is a 6th one coming out next year, so what better time? I felt that people are a little harsh on "Rocky III". Yeah, it's lost a little more edge and originality, but I felt that they kept it cool and within it's origins. Come on, I mean it's the eye of the tiger! Mr. T, he's so cool. He's so bad and you want to hate him, but you can't because he's just so cool. I loved the twist of having Apollo help Rocky train to defeat Mr. T. What more could a Rocky fan want out of this film? It's going strong and I can't wait to watch the fourth one. I know what happens unfortunately, I watch those "I love the 80's" shows. :P But I'm still excited, I love these Rocky movies. I may just see Rocky X! Come on, fans, this doesn't deserve a 5.6, let's get that rating up! 7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":183598,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"1982-05-28","keywords":"challenger,rocky balboa character,adrian character,paulie character,rocky balboa jr character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rocky III","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3464012825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTAwNmQ4YzMtZGM4Yy00ODlmLTk0MDMtNDBjYmEyMDg5ZWM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTAwNmQ4YzMtZGM4Yy00ODlmLTk0MDMtNDBjYmEyMDg5ZWM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for Rocky III"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001735/","name":"Talia Shire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0949350/","name":"Burt Young"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054262/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026841/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Rocky IV
Roki 4
programme.desc:
Rocky IV: Directed by Sylvester Stallone. With Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers. Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0089927/","name":"Rocky IV","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3ODk5ODE0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDkzODM1NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0089927/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"baumer"},"dateCreated":"1999-09-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Forget the politics and this is one of the most entertaining films ever made","reviewBody":"In 1976, a phenom was born. By now we are all aware of the story of how Stallone wrote the screenplay for Rocky in three days after watching a fight between an extreme underdog and a highly favoured champ. Stallone was a nobody back then yet he still stood his ground and didn't sell out to the producers until they promised him the title role. The rest they say is history. Well 9 years later, after three Rocky films, in my opinion comes the best one. I realize that Rocky was all story and then a climatic boxing match and that is what won the film the Oscar. And even though I can admit that this film is not as concerned with character developement as it is with training montages and bulging muscles, it is by far and away the most entertaining film of the 5. And that is what I enjoy about the film. I love that Rocky IV has some of the best training montages ever filmed. I love that it has the heart of a lion when it shows Rocky scaling a mountain that you know damn well he shouldn't be able to. And I absolutely love the boxing match at the end of the film. This was completely choreographed by Stallone and he and Dolph Lundgren boxed for real for about 75% of the match. Stallone felt that it needed some authenticity so that was the way to do it. And if you think Robert De Niro is an impressive method actor, try this fact on for size. When filming the boxing match, some of the scenes were so real that Stallone was rushed to hospital because his heart was actually pushed up and his ribcage was slightly shattered. So when you watch that match at the end, just know that what you are seeing is not exactly choreography and trick camera work. They did the best job they could to keep the look of the fight as real as possible. And I think this is the best boxing match ever filmed, with all due respect to Raging Bull. 

 Stallone was in the shape of his life in this year as he filmed Rocky and Rambo back to back and it shows. I have never seen a more sculpted man in the movies than he was here. And I think that added to his superman persona. If you notice in all the Rocky films, he grows a little each time. And that also adds to the enjoyment of the film. 

Rocky IV is different than Rocky, there is no doubt. And as much as I love the first one, it doesn't come close to entertaining me as much as this one does. Rocky IV starts fast and it ends hard and in between we are blessed with a great soundtrack and a beautiful montage of all the Rocky films to Robert Tepper's "There's No Easy Way Out" And it is here that even though some will say that Stallone has substituted real human emotion with an MTV ersatz video, I think it works well. There is nothing about this film that I didn't enjoy and if you forget what the experience of watching this one is like, I suggest that you rent it now and take a look at it. And try to remember what it was like when you first saw this film back in the winter of 85. I remember I was in Kokomo Indiana visiting family for Christmas. My mom and I walked into a packed theater and you want to talk about a place erupting like a volcano, then this was the place. When Rocky finally hits Drago to cut him over the eye and Duke yells " he's cut, he's cut! " the crowd went into a frenzy. And you can look no further than that as to why the Rocky films were so popular. It doesn't matter if you are Canadian, American, Portuguese, Polish or Dutch or whatever, Rocky appeals to all of us. Because all of us have been the underdog at some time in our lives and we love to watch him and perhaps live vicariously through him. That is the beauty of Rocky. If Rocky can do it then dammit so can I! 

 When the movie ended on that cold night back in 1985, and people were filtering out to their cars for the drive home, I swear I could hear the crowd chanting his name, as did the millions..... and millions of the Rock's fans. 

" Rocky! Rocky! Rocky!""},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":197493,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"1985-11-27","keywords":"training montage,boxing,coming out of retirement,cutting down a tree,loss of friend","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Rocky IV","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3266298649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWRiNzljNmMtYTQwYi00NGE5LTg0YmYtZDY1YzY1MTEyODAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWRiNzljNmMtYTQwYi00NGE5LTg0YmYtZDY1YzY1MTEyODAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001735/","name":"Talia Shire"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0949350/","name":"Burt Young"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026841/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054262/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="
